thread.title: Andre Roberson combined an airball and bank shot for the worst NBA free throws this year
thread.title_full: Andre Roberson combined an airball and bank shot for the worst NBA free throws this year

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Andre Roberson combined an airball and bank shot for the worst NBA free throws this year
text:
This was a bad sequence.
Free throws are not always free. Just ask Andre Roberson . During Monday night’s game against the Warriors , Roberson was at the line for two freebies but it did not go well at all.
His first shot bounced straight off the backboard. He tried to follow it up with a putback and airballed that as well. Then he airballed his second actual free throw.
Whew, this was not a good sequence for Roberson. Roberson is shooting 43 percent from the free-throw line this season and shoots 50 percent for his career. That’s ugly.
